Class Slot

java.lang.Object
Slot
public class Slot extends Object
This Slot class represents the slots the vending machine has that is mapped for specific item. It is composed of the specific item, its slot number, total sales, and the list of items.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a Slot object for the specific item with its slot number

    • addItem

      public boolean addItem(int quantity)
      Adds a specific item inside a slot
      Parameters:
      quantity - Amount of item to be added in the slot
      Returns:
      True if the item is successfully added, otherwise false.

    • removeItem

      public boolean removeItem()
      Removes a specific item from the slot
      Returns:
      True if the item is successfully removed, otherwise false.
